title: Disaster during New Ultra Rapid Fire upload!

replies.body:
D:

RITO PLS

Instead of URF or NURF, we got FUR. Every champion is in a fursuit and just yiffs all game.

It's awful.
Aww man, thats RUF.
no, RUF is a car manufacturer.
no, this is Patrick.
*Madly scribbles idea for next year's April Fools*

> [{quoted}](name=ScuttleChris,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=yoEMxtIr,comment-id=0001000000000002,timestamp=2015-04-01T18:34:46.215+0000)
>
> *Madly scribbles idea for next year's April Fools*

You guys should actually implement NURF after URF ends. I'm sure a lot of folks just want to try it out of curiosity.
Plot twist: Udyr is just a normal guy in a business suit.
Plot twist 2:   hexakill urf on tt
Plot twist ∞: Hexakill, URF, All For One, Doom Bots, Ascension, and Poro King on Twisted Treeline.
PORO CHAMPS
Uh... I normally just comment on GD, but hi, I'm Best Furry NA...

No, NURF.... :'(
You will be missed.....
By like 1% of league players like me!
Wait, is this the Branflakes that moderates for Brandon's Twitch (of Protatomonster)?

No connection, but NOW I WANT TO FIND OUT MORE ABOUT THEM AND THEIR AMAZING CHOICE OF NICKNAMES!

Cheers,

Brandon
Oh, the hu*manatee*!
haha hahaha HAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA

waaaaait... Energy Drink. We drink energy drinks to make us feel energized, or in other words faster. NURF mode was a slow version of normal games. Spilled energy drink makes it run faster. URF mode is a faster version of normal games. URF mode confirmed.
No shit, even {{champion:64}} saw that coming.

except this time it was red bull. red bull gives you wings. There are 6 champions with wings, two of them (corki and azir) only technically have wings. 6 divided by two is 3. there are three champions in the game with names that start with E (elise, evelynn, and ezreal) Two of them are female and the third might as well be (Taric loves you bb) Taric is also basically female, and is obsessed with gems, gems sounds like gyms. Doctor mundo has a skin that involves throwing weights, which are found in a gym. Doctor mundo regens health quickly, who else is quick at something? Rammus. Rammus uses powerball to go fast. Gotta go fast? {{champion:33}}: OK. OK has two letters, there are two champions with a charm: ahri and her ability of the same name, and urgot with his handsome good looks. Urgot was played in the LCS URF match last year and was considered OP, Urgot has recently risen to power in the LCS as a viable pick. Coincidence? I think not, and here is why, Urgot sounds like URFgot, as in URFs-got to come back. In other words, URF mode confirmed.
Almost. Hyper Kinetic Position Reverser is a suppression, not a charm. 9/10 for effort though.
He was speaking of Urgot's innate charm not an ability.
Thank you for understanding sir
Energy potions confirmed
PLEASE! {{champion:84}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:85}}
You forgot {{champion:33}}  and his ninja skin (he's still praying for that energy)

> Around midnight on the east coast,

Yer not fooling anyone riot. We all know you never moved servers to the east coast!
well the could have cause i'm on the west cost and i've been lagging all day
Now you bastards understand what the rest of us have to deal with...
{{summoner:6}} Just remove that 3v3 and put URF as a PERMANENT mode. Simple like that.
I'd rather see dominion go instead of Twisted Treeline
What's Dominion?  Is that the alternate game mode on the Hide and Seek map?{{champion:48}}
Did NURF change to URF?

Warped Ultra Rapid Fire.

WURF.

SMURF

Super Mega Ultra Rapid Fire
We can only pray to Avarosa that that happens...
Am I the only one who ACTUALLY wants to try NURF?
tbh i want to try it too, but only once, then i want URF again
I felt a great disturbance in the URF, as if millions of voices suddenly cried out in terror, and were suddenly silenced. I feel something wonderful has happened.

A disturbance in the **URF** you say?
This truly is, a dire time for us all.

Guys you'll love this :)

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/03/urf-rising.html#more

(That Log-In Screen {{summoner:31}} )
{{summoner:12}}  THANK GOD!! {{summoner:12}}
Good wan RIOT, playing with my emotions just like my wallet...
Nope, just your wallet
We are all excited to find that when we sign in its a 1v1 chess match with normal pieces replaced with champions, like ashe and tryn.

"The only existing copies of New Ultra Rapid Fire perished in the flames, and, while only time will tell, it appears that the **uploaded version** has **transformed**."

ty rito <3 Love you 4ever (Unless we got trolled...)
U pick your champion, but they have a random set of skills that are enhanced, u r now a doom bot
Thump up if your waiting xD
THE SERVERS ARE DIEING NOOOOOOOOOOO I WAS LOGGED IN BUT I LOGGED OUT NOW IM SCREWWWWED
i love that they put this up, cuz i JUST put up a comment earlier about nurf being urf...i mean think about it, when has a new game type NOT come to the pbe?
